item.title: Takeaways from the fifth anniversary of Jan. 6
item.description: President Donald Trump appears stronger than ever as he continues his attempts to rewrite the history of the U.S. Capitol attack.

item.title: States where abortion is legal, banned or under threat
item.description: More than a dozen states have laws that criminalize abortion when the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade. Here’s a look at abortion laws by state.
